name: ReleaseNotes
description: Generate release notes based on a specified commit range
author: Ieuan Walker
instanceNameFormat: Generate Release Notes from Commit Range

inputs.name: startCommit
inputs.label: Start Commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SHA or reference (like a tag) for the start of the commit range (exclusive)

inputs.name: endCommit
inputs.label: End Commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SHA or reference (like a tag) for the end of the commit range (inclusive)

inputs.name: outputFileMarkdown
inputs.label: Output File - Markdown
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where the generated release notes will be saved

inputs.name: outputFileHtml
inputs.label: Output File - HTML
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where the generated release notes will be saved

inputs.name: templateFileMarkdown
inputs.label: Template File - Markdown
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional path to a Handlebars template file for formatting the release notes. If not provided, a default template will be used.

inputs.name: templateFileHtml
inputs.label: Template File - HTML
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional path to a Handlebars template file for formatting the release notes. If not provided, a default template will be used.
